context: This is the best idea Donald Trump ever came up with.
"Do people still believe in this fish tale?".. (Jim Carrey re. Nasa).

There should simply be a Human Space Program, have all nations work together. We need to bring Humanity to Earth Like Worlds and to adapt Humanity and everything we bring with us to those Worlds. There's no sense pretending that the nations of Earth are going to colonize new Earth Like Worlds, though.

No nation on Earth will ever have authority on any ELW, because there's no practical means of enforcing authority over an ELW. Even if you send unmanned space vessels to teach the Humans on an ELW a lesson, you'll never live to find out what happens, your USV's might not even reach that ELW before the total collapse of your nation on Earth.

To get to ELWs, Humans will travel in Generation ships. Entire generations of Humanity will spend their entire lives on these Generation Ships. By the time Humans get to one of these ELW's, they will be their own people. And over time, the differences between Humans on Earth and Humans on one of these ELW's will increase. By a process of random mutation and adaptation, the evolution of mores and so on, Humans on ELW's will differ from Humans on Earth, in all kinds of ways.

Even if Humans on an ELW speak English, they will develop words we don't have on Earth, to describe things that simply don't exist on Earth. In any way and every way, Humans on ELW's will eventually come to be their own people. And they will live in their own nations, according to their own mores, well beyond the practical reach or authority of the nations of Earth.
